EmailTemplate.description: CSR final response to customer providing PDF document when request is only for No Bid parts
EmailTemplate.name: D&S NO Quote QSTC
EmailTemplate.subject: P&DR# {!Case.Quote_Number__c} RFQ# {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Honeywell respectfully informs you that a No Quote has been sent regarding your request. P&DR# {!Case.Quote_Number__c} Quotation: {!Case.SAP_Quote_Number__c} RFQ# {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}
Note: Please direct all questions and comments pertaining to this quote to your Honeywell representative.
Regards, Quotes Team
